title: Tiger Attacking an Antelope
provenance_text:
M. Mallet, Paris, France until  September 7, 1911; sold to M. Knoedler and Co., Paris, France and New York, NY on September 7, 1911 until March 25, 1919 [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, March 1919.

Notes:
[1]. Knoedler NY no. 12498 (described as A. Barye Bronze 5112 "Tiger & Antilope", the number 5112 likely being the Paris stock number.) Acquired for 5500 francs. See copies of relevant entries from Knoedler Archive, The Getty Research Institute in curatorial file.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
